item.title: [Pwn/Reverse] Unobserved Box (200 pts, 6 solves)
item.description: Source of the problem: HKCERT CTF 2021 Problem Statement All codes are uncertain before the measurement, and you will never make it. Observe the code to get the flag. nc chalp.hkcert21.pwnable.hk 28132 Solution Outline We dump the binary from 0x400000 to 0x405000 using format string and %8$s, then reverse engineer the check function for the flag. Initial Discoveries Let’s have a look at the server: ‚ùØ nc chalp.hkcert21.pwnable.hk 28132 AAAAAAAA AAAAAAAA is not the correct answer.
